remarks: Set of arrows of the category of non-unital rings (in a universe). (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngchomfvalOLD.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
rngchomfvalOLD $p |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x RngHomo y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
